name: Hoppy Pals
description:
Hop to a high score in this simple and endlessly addictive, yet challenging one-click arcade game. Collect coins, avoid the obstacles and stay afloat in Hoppy Pals!

Hoppy Pals is currently in OPEN BETA and the version currently uploaded is optimized for iOS.  A browser version will release seperately.  Game is subject to change upon final release.

CONTROLS

Click-short jump

Hold-long jump 

Thank you for your time!

Music by Jim Kulakowski
